channel.title: Help with new server
channel.description:
Based on-PhoneScape
Hello to all. I have recently had some trouble today with getting my server up and running. I have my No-IP up and ready and a name for my server to. I also have my file on WinRAR w\ PhoneScape saved on there. Only one problem. When I go to where I saved my source-folder and open it, I try to do compile and runserver, but when I TRY to open them it says that "javac" not recognized as an internal or external command. Operable program or batch file. So can you help me? I've tried the TUT's on many sections but I jsut can't seem to locate the materials I need.
Thanks
-Bridge-

item.title: Help with new server
item.dc:creator: @niels11 niels11
item.description:
@niels11 wrote:

I hope you do,Ill post what you got to have in them :
Compiler :
@echo off
title PhoneScape Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Runserver :
@echo off
java -cp .;./jython.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new server

item.description:
@emo-cabbage wrote:

did u edit your runserver and compiler??
